about_the_game:
Dive in the world of Wolcen: Lords of Mayhem through the high-quality Original Soundtrack, featuring Bosses, Maps and Events epic scoring.

The 1h51 minutes of music (35 tracks), live-recorded with the City of Prague Philharmonic Orchestra and Four for Music Choirs and featuring solo artists are available in 2 formats: Uncompressed MP3 (320kbps, 257Mb) and lossless FLAC (1,33Gb).

Music files will be downloaded in the root folder of the game, in a folder called original_soundrack

Composed and arranged by Cédric Baravaglio and Jean-Gabriel Raynaud
Live recordings : City of Prague Philharmonic Orchestra & Four for Music
Mixing : Robin Birner
Soloists : Roxane Genot (Cello), Jan Hoeglund (Violatar)
Orchestration : George Strezov & Four for Music, Nathan Einhorn, Marwan Piechaud
Mastering : Unique Horns Studios
